EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Mobile Testing with Tosca Testsuite and MobileLabs - 2015.06.16.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register! – Webinar: Mobile Testing with Tosca & Mobile Labs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Mobile Testing with Tosca Testsuite and Mobile Labs
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Don’t forget to register for our newest webinar taking place tomorrow, “Mobile Testing with Tosca Testsuite and Mobile Labs!” Designing an app for mobile devices can be quite complex, regardless of whether it is a desktop version or not. There are ways however, to streamline your development and testing process for better app quality and faster time to market.
Join us in the webinar to learn how to use the power of Mobile Labs in conjunction with Tosca to centralize your device management and test all mobile devices.
We look forward to seeing you at the webinar on June 16th, 2015 at 4:00 PM CEST!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/mobile-testing-with-tosca-and-mobilelabs-20150616?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/mobile-testing-with-tosca-and-mobilelabs-20150616?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Tue, Jun 16, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CEST 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EDT
Paul O’Callaghan Vice President, Global Alliances and International Sales Operations Mobile Labs
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
